name: conductivity
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the property of allowing heat or electricity to go through something, or the degree to which a substance allows this this: a high level of conductivity electrical/thermal conductivity See
conductive
More examplesFewer examplesAluminium has good heat conductivity.The change in electrical conductivity is measured at suitable time intervals.It has a very low thermal conductivity, so it retains heat well.
